About MakeItSo

MakeItSo is a bare startup theme with the minimum of styling. It is however set up with the assumption a website is centered and full width.

A base project setup

MakeItSo strives to not give you unneeded and excessive markup, CSS styles and classes or pre-made design patterns. There is some base styling in place or else this would look like the 90's. Remove or change the SCSS partials as desired. Or just go ahead on this base and add your css to _theme.scss or create your own partials.

Some important details:

  • Normalize.css is used as default to align browsers' rendering appearrance and positioning.
  • Need a grid in place at a certain break-point? Just declare (wrapper) widths in percentages, float them and be done with it. No 'col-6', 'spacer-3' or 'med-12-4-1-grid_home_bloat'. See the example classes in _theme.scss for 2 or three columns. Modern CSS Grid examples are in preparation.
  • Probably the most opinionated (but small) piece of functionality in this project is the mobile menu toggle functionality on small screens in combination with the search block. If you don't like it, take it out. It's fairly easy and a small effort: remove the lines of code in source/js/custom.js

HTML elements example pages

The article example page contains base HTML elements to show how the base styling looks in this setup. If you still miss an element here for reference, please let me know.

The form example page shows you the default generic styling of a form and form elements. Go check them out.

MakeItSo is responsive and built mobile first.
